FIGURE 14-1
Advantages of Global Marketing Programs
Economies of scale in production and distribution
Lower marketing costs
Power and scope
Consistency in brand image
Ability to leverage good ideas quickly and efficiently
Uniformity of marketing practices
summary_markdown: Figure 14-1 outlines the advantages of global marketing programs, presenting a set of benefits that accrue from a unified international marketing strategy. These advantages include achieving economies of scale in both production and distribution processes, which can lead to cost reductions. Furthermore, global marketing programs contribute to lower overall marketing costs and enhance a company's power and scope in the international arena. A key outcome is the maintenance of a consistent brand image across different markets, alongside the ability to leverage successful ideas rapidly and efficiently. Finally, the approach promotes uniformity in marketing practices, streamlining operations and reinforcing brand presence worldwide.
